com.vincestyling.asqliteplus
Interface RowMapper<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the mapped entity.
public interface RowMapper<T>

An interface used for mapping each row of a Cursor to a result object. Typically used to query a list datasource, it's an ideal choice for implementing row-mapping logic in a single place.

See Also:
DBOverseer.getList(Object, RowMapper)

Method Summary
 T mapRow(android.database.Cursor cursor)
          Implementations must implement this method to map each row of data in the Cursor.
 

Method Detail

mapRow

T mapRow(android.database.Cursor cursor)
Implementations must implement this method to map each row of data in the Cursor. This method should not call any non-column operation such as move(); it is only supposed to map values of the current row.

Parameters:
cursor - the Cursor to map (pre-moved for the current row)
Returns:
the result object for the current row
